scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:rag-backend" "npm run start:audio-backend" "npm run start:daw"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:rag-backend" "npm run start:audio-backend" "npm run start:daw"
scripts.start:rag-backend: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/backend/agentic_rag && FLASK_APP=main.py FLASK_ENV=development python -m flask run --port 5000
scripts.start:monitor-backend: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/backend && FLASK_APP=monitor_api.py FLASK_ENV=development python -m flask run --port 8000
scripts.build: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && npm install && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.build-all: npm run build --workspace=orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && npm run build --workspace=orpheus-engine-workstation/backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend || echo 'Tests skipped - react-scripts not found'
scripts.test:frontend: cd orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && (test -f node_modules/.bin/react-scripts && npm test -- --watchAll=false --passWithNoTests || echo 'Skipping tests - react-scripts not installed')
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning workspace...' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && rm -rf orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend/node_modules orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend/package-lock.json && rm -rf orpheus-engine-workstation/backend/node_modules orpheus-engine-workstation/backend/package-lock.json && echo 'Installing dependencies...' && npm install
scripts.lint:frontend: echo 'Linting frontend via build process...' && cd orpheus-engine-workstation/frontend && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:patch && npm run branch:release && npm run github:release
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:minor && npm run branch:release && npm run github:release
scripts.release:major: npm run release:prepare && npm run version:major && npm run branch:release && npm run github:release
scripts.release:prepare: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge develop
scripts.version:patch: npm run validate && npm run changelog && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm run validate && npm run changelog && npm version 1.1.0 --no-git-tag-version -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: (npm run validate || true) && npm run changelog && npm version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.branch:feature: git checkout develop && git checkout -b feature/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:hotfix: git checkout main && git checkout -b hotfix/$npm_config_name
scripts.branch:cleanup: git branch --merged | grep -v '\*\|main\|develop' | xargs -r git branch -d
scripts.branch:release: git branch | grep -q "release/v$npm_package_version" && echo "Branch release/v$npm_package_version already exists" || git checkout -b release/v$npm_package_version
scripts.github:release: gh release create v$npm_package_version --title "Release v$npm_package_version" --notes "$(cat CHANGELOG.md | sed -n "/^## \[$npm_package_version\]/,/^## /p" | sed '$ d')" || echo "Could not create release. Make sure gh CLI is installed and authenticated."
